title: BRIEF-Itron Inc - ‍Jordan Water Company (Miyahuna) Signs Three-Year Contract For Analytic Services And Additional Itron Static Water Meters​

organizations.name: miyahuna) signs three-year contract for analytic services and additional itron

text: Market News March 22, 2018 / 12:53 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Itron Inc - ‍Jordan Water Company (Miyahuna) Signs Three-Year Contract For Analytic Services And Additional Itron Static Water Meters​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Itron Inc: * ITRON INC - ‍JORDAN WATER COMPANY (MIYAHUNA) SIGNS THREE-YEAR CONTRACT FOR ANALYTIC SERVICES AND ADDITIONAL ITRON STATIC WATER METERS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
